data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Khmel'nyts'kyy unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khmel‘nyts‘kyy, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Khmel‘nyts‘kyy, Ukraine to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary: On average, 109 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Khmel‘nyts‘kyy, Ukraine.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, teach the 49,575 believers in Khmel'nyts'kyy that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 49,575 believers in Khmel'nyts'kyy to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Kyrgyz people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Kyrgyz people.
Spirit, teach the 49,575 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Khmel'nyts'kyy to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, purify the 49,575 believers in the state of Khmel'nyts'kyy to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

location.name: Khmel'nyts'kyy
location.people_groups_list: Azerbaijani, Orochi, Pashtun, Southern, Bashkir, Jew, Karaite
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Azerbaijani (41,000), Orochi (900), Pashtun, Southern (900), Bashkir (3,800), Jew, Karaite (1,200)
